body.p:
The standard Main Input Circuit Breaker is as follows:
<225kVA: thermal magnetic circuit rated 80% at 480VAC with 35 kAIC and matched to thetransformer size.
225kVA â€“ 3000 kVA: fixed (non-adjustable) electronic trip circuit breaker rated 80% at 480VAC with 35 kAIC and matched to the transformer size. The PDU has many Main Input Circuit Breaker options with different
PDU voltages, amperages, kAIC ratings, and trip settings. Consult with your sales representative or Eaton Engineering for options.
